title: The Importance of Laughing Together
itunes:summary:
One of the best ways to have fun with your spouse is to laugh together. John talks with Greg and Erin about how laugher has benefitted their marriage. Featuring Pastor Ted Cunningham.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

A Love That Laughs: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/singleitem/checkout/donation/item/don-fofm-podcast-2020-11-03#refcd=1010904

Get More Episode Resources: https://focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/the-importance-of-laughing-together/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
